attributes.title: Russ Bain
attributes.twitter: https://twitter.com/russbain1'''Russ Bain''' is an actor and voice actor. He has appeared in television series such as ''Casualty'', ''The Borgias'', ''Castle'' and ''Graceland'', as well as the music videos "Space Bound" by Eminem and "Perfume" by Britney Spears.In ''Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series'', he voices Rodrik Forrester.==Credits==Telltale Game Series Credits
